meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> find their <radical>death</radical> in a <radical>river</radical> out in the <kanji>wild</kanji>. Flowers live on water, but this river drowns the flowers to death. The wild is a dangerous place.
readingMnemonic: <reading>Ah</reading> (あ), the flowers in the <kanji>wild</kanji> have been claimed <reading>à la</reading> (あら) the great flood. Ah, you don’t think so? Well I do.
